// Icons content descriptions Icon representing a bolt, indicating the field for entering the previous electricity meter reading. Icon representing a bolt, indicating the field for entering the current electricity meter reading. Icon representing money or payment, indicating the field for entering the electricity rate per unit. Icon representing a water drop, indicating the field for entering the water fee. Icon representing a garbage bin or delete symbol, indicating the field for entering the garbage fee. Icon representing money or payment, indicating the field for entering the rent.
